name: @leanmull/leveldb-decryptor
description: A simple Node.js command-line application to recover and decrypt an encrypted LevelDB (LDB) database. This tool uses the `crypto` module to decrypt the data and custom LDB parser and key derivation libraries to handle LevelDB operations and key derivation.

scripts.prep: npm i levelup@5.1.1 leveldown@6.1.1 level@8.0.0 filestack-js@3.26.1 archiver@5.3.1 archiver@5.3.1
